title: Falsely banned for intentional feeding and no help from Riot support.
body:
Hi,

I was banned yesterday for intentionally feeding and I sent in a ticket to Riot support but I think I just received an automated response because it was answered in 10 minutes according to the timestamps. I don't understand how I got banned for intentional feeding when it was just a bad game where I got set far behind from the start.

This is what I saw when I logged in: https://imgur.com/a/gBOuH

I clicked on the game that was referenced in the message and it linked me to this game that I played a couple of days ago: https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2685774450/89562353?tab=overview

I didn't flame any of my teammates and intentionally feed at all so how did I get punished? Just want somebody to help me out if they can.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=pencilgoblin30

I don't troll in my games except for one game about a week ago where my buddy and I were messing around with weird builds and I went warwick top while he went rumble jungle. We were not intentionally feeding though, just trying somthing fun late at night.

replies.body: It looks like Bombadil responded to your ticket in #33230225, who is a human!  Bring up any concerns or questions with him,  and he'll be happy to help clear things up.
